entry.def: A closed-circuit television or video system is one that operates within a limited area such as a building.

example.ex: There's a closed-circuit television camera in the reception area.
example.tran: 接待处有一个闭路电视摄像头。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or consisting of a closed circuit;
